page.title: 01THE HANSLOPE AREA.
page.content: IN OUR BLOCK THERE IS HANSLOPE WHICH IS A VILLAGE.IT HAS GOT A POPULATION OF ABOUT 1600 AND STOKE GOLDINGTON WITH ABOUT 250 AND TATHALL END WITH ABOUT 23 PEOPLE.ALL OF OUR SQUARE IS IN BUCKINGHAMSHIRE EXCEPT A FEILD IN THE TOP LEFT CORNER WHICH IS IN NORTHAMPTONSHIRE.THERE ARE 8 FARMS IN HANSLOPE AND 2 FARMS IN STOKE GOLDINGTON AND 2 FARMS IN TATHALL END.THERE ARE 4 CHUCHS AND CHAPELS IN HANSLOPE,1 IN STOKE GOLDINGTON.THERE ARE 4 PUBS AND 1 OFF LICENCE IN HANSLOPE AND A PUB IN STOKE GOLDINGTON.IN HANSLOPE THERE ARE 7 SHOPS,IN STOKE GOLDINGTON THERE IS 1 SHOP.THERE ARNÂ£T ANY SHOPS IN TATHALL END.THERE IS 1 SCHOOL IN HANSLOPE AND 1 IN STOKE GOLDINGTON.THERE IS ONE PLAYSCHOOL FOR BETWEEN 3-5 YEAR OLDS.THE LAND IS MANILY USED FOR FARMING,GROWING CROPS AND FOR GRAZING.
